SobreMi.descripcion: With knowledge in modern technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind, React, SQL, Vercel, and more. I offer web solutions that are both innovative and modern.

Investigaciones.item2: Investment of OpenAI tokens for provider integration and model usage.
Investigaciones.item5: Research and integration of Vercel AI SDK with Next.js.

Servicios.titulo2: Knowledge and technologies I apply in my projects.

item1.descripcion: Creation of visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, and modern frameworks like <highlight>React and NextJS</highlight>.

item2.descripcion: Transformation of designs into functional and responsive layouts, ensuring visual consistency, spacing, and adaptability to <highlight>mobile, tablet, and desktop screens</highlight>.

item3.descripcion: Development of queries and structures in <highlight>SQL</highlight> to store, filter, and analyze data.

item4.descripcion: Integration of artificial intelligence solutions into web applications, developing <highlight>chatbots</highlight> with memory and real-time responses through streaming.

item5.descripcion: Implementation and consumption of external <highlight>APIs and libraries</highlight> to integrate advanced functionalities.

item6.descripcion: Deployment of web projects on <highlight>Vercel</highlight> and database management through <highlight>Vercel Storage</highlight>.

ProyectoActual.descripcion: LexifyAI is a web application powered by artificial intelligence designed to transform the way people learn languages. It combines contextual translation with interactive conversations.

proyecto1.descripcion: Project built with Next.js, focused on providing a modern interface for nutrition services. Integrates artificial intelligence through a specialized chatbot and an authentication system that allows generating personalized plans according to user requirements.

proyecto2.descripcion: Project built with Next.js, centered on creating a responsive interface for community management. Implements clean design principles, reusable components, and performance optimization.

proyecto3.descripcion: Project focused on understanding the architecture and customization of Shadcn/UI. Implemented various components and styles to become familiar with its integration in modern Next.js environments.

Sidebar.descripcion: I'm always excited to take on new projects, collaborate with innovative minds, and expand my knowledge.
